purpose: To provide a centralized repository of valuable resources for learning and exploring robotics
principle: Aggregates links and resources related to robotics from various domains and organizes them into a curated list
reusability: Easily accessible and extendable list for educational and research purposes, contributions are welcomed via GitHub
limitations: Dependent on community contributions for updates and may contain outdated links
name: awesome-robotics
description: A list of awesome Robotics resources
highlight: Comprehensive curated list of robotics resources and materials
